item.title: My OSR story
item.description: My OSR story Although I am of the correct age to have been a player of Chainmail and the subsequent games, I never played until about 2019. I had some exposure in the 80’s as one of my roommates played, but I was about to get married and although I bought some books at the time, I never played. My first game was a D&D Adventurers Leage1 game at Atomic Empire2 in Durham, NC.
